deprecated
Class JointEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      deprecated.JointEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class JointEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

An event that indicates that an action has occurred with a Joint. This event is generated when a joint's location, minimum value, or maximum value has been updated.

The object that implements the JointChangeListener interface will receive these events to receive updated information about the joint concerned.

Author:
Owner
See Also:
JointChangeListener, Joint, Serialized Form

                  double pos,

Creates a JointEvent object with the position, max and min information.

Parameters:
source - The object that originated the event.
pos - The position of the joint which fired the event.
max - The maximum position of the joint which fired the event.
min - The minimum position of the joint which fired the event.
